events.message: I just filed a claim reporting the car collision that occurred yesterday evening on Elm Street. The front bumper is badly damaged and the airbags deployed.
The insurance claim has been categorised under Auto Accident following the assessment of the initial report and damage type.
An agent has been assigned to your case to guide you through the next steps of the claims process and answer any questions.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and assure you that it will be processed as quickly as possible.
Please submit all relevant documents including police reports, photos of the damaged vehicle, and repair estimates to proceed with your claim.
All requested documents, including the official police report and detailed images of the damage, have been submitted for review.
Our claim investigation team has started reviewing all submitted documents and inspecting the damage reports related to your vehicle accident.
The investigation into your auto accident claim has been completed, confirming the coverage eligibility and extent of damage.
We have proposed a settlement amount based on the damage estimate and policy coverage related to your vehicle collision claim.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the transparent communication throughout the process.
Your auto accident claim has been approved, and we are now preparing the payment to cover the repair costs as agreed.
The settlement payment has been issued directly to your bank account to cover all approved repair expenses.
The claim file has been officially closed following successful payment and completion of the vehicle repairs.
All claim documentation and records for this auto accident have been archived securely in compliance with data retention policies.
